member.name: T:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQuery
member.summary: Task to execute a non-query SQL command.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQuery.Server
member.summary: The SQL server to connect to.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQuery.SqlCommand
member.summary: The SQL non-query command to execute.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQuery.InitialCatalog
member.summary: The inital catalog to connect to.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQuery.UserID
member.summary: The user to use to connect to the server when using SQL authentication.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQuery.Password
member.summary: The password to use to connect to the server when using SQL authentication.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQuery.IntegratedSecurity
member.summary: Enables/disables IntegratedSecurity in the connection string.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQuery.Pooling
member.summary: Enables/disables Pooling in the connection string.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQuery.TrustServerCertificate
member.summary: TrustServerCertificate bypasses the SQL server certificate check.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQuery.ErrorStops
member.summary: Forces the build to fail on error.

member.name: T:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQueryScript
member.summary: Task to execute a non-query SQL command that is read from a SQL script file.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQueryScript.Server
member.summary: The SQL server to connect to.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQueryScript.SqlScript
member.summary: The the path to the SQL non-query script.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQueryScript.InitialCatalog
member.summary: The inital catalog to connect to.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQueryScript.UserID
member.summary: The user to use to connect to the server when using SQL authentication.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQueryScript.Password
member.summary: The password to use to connect to the server when using SQL authentication.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQueryScript.IntegratedSecurity
member.summary: Enables/disables IntegratedSecurity in the connection string.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQueryScript.Pooling
member.summary: Enables/disables Pooling in the connection string.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQueryScript.TrustServerCertificate
member.summary: TrustServerCertificate bypasses the SQL server certificate check.

member.name: P:NAntSqlTasks.ExecuteNonQueryScript.ErrorStops
member.summary: Forces the build to fail on error.
